caption.p: Spatial patterns of mean annual seasonal ET of the LP: ( a) March, April, and May (MAM), ( b) June, July, and August (JJA), ( c) June, July, and August (JJA), and ( d) December, January and February (DJF). Map was created using ArcMap 10.0 ( http://www.esri.com/sofware/arcgis/arcgis-for-desktop).
